section.title: Service Proposition
section.para: Tracker provides livestock producers, infrastructure providers and process control auditors; an effective, low cost solution for managing and exchanging animal premises and event history information.

section.title: Project Goals
Functional Description
section.para: Tracker documents animal event histories for farm animal producers and/or livestock infrastructure providers. Animal premises, animals and event histories are created, edited, manipulated, and persisted as Premises documents. Premises documents are displayed and manipulated with Tracker editors, wizards, and various importing and exporting utilities.
